column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I'm not one that thinks the customer is always right
column2: but I left that day with such a bad taste in my mouth in addition to a hole in my wallet that I probably won't return. I felt like I was in high school again and some mean girl was talking SH behind my back. Except this was right in front of my face. If you want customers to return and pay high dollar for pastries
column3: that's not the way to treat them. If I were to order food and sit down and eat there
column4: I would have tipped but to be rude about it in front of me was unnecessary.
